author: jandrea
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #26897 from 110X

Addition of TH2F plots showing the z-phi (r-phi) position of on track hits for the SiStrip barrel (endcaps). The plots are made per layer (per disk).


#### PR validation:

Compiles with CMSSW_10_6_X_2019-05-21-2300, tested with "runTheMatrix.py -l 10024 " and for 10 events.
title: Adding Sistrip DQM Cluster Maps (backport of PR #26897)
